In the cold dark icy plains of what will one day be Norway  Veratis scans a
new bot, none of the other factions had aproached the newcomer yet so the
old bot decided to send his associate to investigate. "Foxfingers get ready
for a road trip, we may have a new friend to join us."

Foxfingers stood from his console and started to leave. He turned as he
reached the door worried about a possible hostile greeting, "What should I
do if he fires on me?" the foxbot asked.

Veratis smiled his best smile, "Do what you do best." He knew fully well
what Foxfingers was capable of and had complete faith in the youngsters
abilities. "I'll try to communicate with the bot, I'll see if I can prepare
him for your arrival." The old scientist took a seat where Foxfingers had
just vacated and opened a comm signal. "Please reply, My name is Veratis,
I'm currently west of your current location. I'm sending a bot to rendevous
with your location, ETA a few hours. If you are receiving this message
please respond."

Foxfingers exited the ship and hopped on his hoverboard, he flew to the east
to meet with Veratis' new associate.

 Sent: Saturday, January 06, 2001 7:43 AM
Subject: Sudie flys away


> OOC:Sorry got sick again...
>
> BIC: Sudie starts to fly away,
